import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { library } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; var FontAwesome = require('react-fontawesome'); class CurrentWeather extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { }; } render() { return (

Today

{this.props.location}

{this.props.date}

{this.props.currentWeather['main']}

{this.props.currentWeather['description']}

{Math.ceil(this.props.currentWeatherTemps['temp'])}° Feels Like {Math.ceil(this.props.currentWeatherTemps['feels_like'])}°

High/Low

{this.props.high}°/{this.props.low}°

Humidity

{this.props.currentWeatherTemps['humidity']}

Wind

{this.props.currentWind}

Sunrise

{this.props.sunrise}

Sunset

{this.props.sunset}

); } } export default CurrentWeather;
